titleStmt.title: The amours of Charles Duke of Mantua and Margaret Countess of Rovera· A novel. Translated out of Itallian.
Amore di Carlo Gonzaga, duca di Mantova, e della contessa Margarita della Rovere. English
titleStmt.author: Leti, Gregorio, 1630-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Herringman, and sold by Jos. Knight and Francis Saunders, at the Blew-Anchor, in the lower walk of the New-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Leti, Gregorio. L'amore di Carlo Gonzaga, duca di Mantova, e della contessa Margarita della Rovere.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Edition.

place.placeName: the Blew-Anchor, in the lower walk of the New-Exchange
